TopicTitle: KSP Keeps crashing with mods installed

Articles.Content:
I have know how KSP version 1.3 has caused it to crash with mods installed, so i went back to version 1.2.2 on Steam. After reinstalling the mods i had deleted, i booted up the x64 bit version of KSP on steam and halfway through it loading, like with the 1.3 version, it crashed! I have no idea why it did, since i sadly have no idea what the crash logs mean (as in i don't know what any of the computer mumbo-jumbo means in the crash logs), So i'm asking for help with the crashes and the crash log so i can fix the problem

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/dm4qxkfe0055n2c/AACYwFZcdTlN4_ZpRSmLO1h5a?dl=0

Please help, please.

It's probably crashing because you already updated some of your mods (at least Module Manager). You generally need the versions that were made for 1.2.2 if you want to use 1.2.2 and the versions that were made for 1.3 if you want to use 1.3. They are not backwards compatible.
